newsitem.title: GERMANY: SKW Trostberg 9-mo sales up 4 pct.
newsitem.headline: SKW Trostberg 9-mo sales up 4 pct.

text.p: German speciality chemicals group SKW Trostberg AG said on Friday sales climbed four percent to 2.97 billion marks ($2 billion) in the first nine months of the year.
SKW added that its operating profit during the period was about the same as in the year-ago period with most of the profit coming from construction chemicals.
After its acquisition of Master Builders Technology from Swiss group Sandoz AG, SKW is to be the world's leader in construction chemicals.
